  • Method Details

    • getMaxDate

      @Query(value="SELECT MAX(date) FROM ecb_exchange_rates", nativeQuery=true) Date getMaxDate()

    • getRatesByFromToDate

      @Query(value="SELECT date, IF(?4, rate, 1 / rate) AS rate FROM ecb_exchange_rates WHERE currency = ?1 AND date BETWEEN ?2 AND ?3", nativeQuery=true) List<EcbExchangeRatesRepository.CalcRates> getRatesByFromToDate(String currency, Date fromDate, Date toDate, boolean euroBase)
